title: Allow to easely register codec for POJO to use with the EventBus
body:
### Description

In the current version (2.7.2.Final) POJO which can be deduced from @ConsumeEvent endpoints are automatically registered, it's really good, but if we want to implement a simple routing solution which makes use of the Object type as a return type for the endpoint then we have to manually register the POJO in order to use them with the event bus.

If we could have an annotation such as :

@RegisterForEventBus or something like that, it would enable us to write cleaner code

### Implementation ideas

I don't know how the codec are automatically implemented but I suppose we could just pick up those POJO using an annotation and implement the codecs at the same time we implement the codec deduced from the endpoints
